about.title: About Work Hours Calculator
about.description: A modern web application for calculating and managing work schedules across different time zones. This tool helps users define their working hours and visualize availability in their manager's time zone, making remote work coordination easier.
about.feature1: Define weekly work schedule with flexible start and end times
about.feature2: Search and select manager's city/timezone with real-time clocks
about.feature3: View availability summary showing overlap between work schedules
about.feature4: Multi-language support with automatic language detection
about.feature5: Light and dark theme with responsive, mobile-first design
